Reviews.Title: After Initial Shock - Camera is really good
Reviews.Author: J. Sundaram
Reviews.Content: Here's the thing - this camera does NOT COME with a memory card.  So when you pull it out of the package - there are 2 batteries and you can take 1 (YES - ONE) picture.  For novices - this means you must also buy an SD card - which granted is about $1 / per 1 GB (I bought an 8GB card here on Amazon).  I think this is because "memory size" is a personal choice and since it effects overall price I sort of understand why the camera comes without... But my point is that it doesn't exactly "work" out of the box.  However, the camera, once I got a SD card, works really well.  My 5 year old is the primary user - it seems to take great pictures for her - very easily.  And the 5x zoom is great for really close up stuff that kids like.  So overall, good camera, but you need 2 purchases - the camera and an SD card.

Reviews.Title: Came in time for Christmas!!
Reviews.Author: Lil Angel
Reviews.Content: I bought this item to give as a gift for Christmas.  It was shipped and delivered in less than a week, which was fantastic not worrying whether it would get here in time.  It was a great price and I am very happy with the quality of the pictures.  It has a slight delay from the moment you click the top and it takes the picture but it's still better than some cameras I've had.  This is a great starter camera, particularly for a teenager which is the one that received it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible pictures
Reviews.Author: S. Salinas
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my mom for Christmas. I've used it as much as she has and I've been the one to transfer the pictures off the camera to the computer. She hates this camera and I've got to agree with her. The "easy share" is not so easy but she isn't that concerned with that. It's the quality of the pictures that is so horrible. They are so foggy. It looks like there is some type of film over the lens but I've cleaned it several times and it is still there. See the images I added to see what I'm talking about. Don't waste your money on this camera.

Reviews.Title: good for a grandma
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Petrick
Reviews.Content: not the greatest camera, but good enough for a child  or someone not wanting alot of features to have to confuse them.

Reviews.Title: Cute Cam!
Reviews.Author: Belle
Reviews.Content: I know you men out there may not define a camera as "cute" but, that's what comes to mind when I see it. It wokrs well; takes great quality pics and has other great specs about it for not being a high end rated camera. Its definitly a great buy.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: RoRo
Reviews.Content: This is a camera that takes good pictures with items that need detail. The size makes it easy to store and carry. Over all this is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use product
Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: The category point-and-shot really describes this product. Great pictures and fast shutter, even with targets in movement. I'm pleased with the price-result ratio. The size is very confortable.

Reviews.Title: What a great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Shaffer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it.  It's very easy to use and the pictures come out very clear.  Would definitely recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Neat camera
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Bradshaw "msbrad"
Reviews.Content: Camera is just what my grandson wanted.  Simple, yet beautiful photos.  Boy is 8 years old and has mastered the basics.  now on to the other features.

Reviews.Title: eh
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Terrible camera. I have had several kodaks and loved them. This one takes horrible pics inside. I know most dig cams work better in natural light, but this one is terrible. I wouldn't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: What crap
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: This is supposed to be a12 MP camera, and I think my flip phone from 5 years ago to better photos. I have changed setting and uploaded them to my computer assuming it may just be the screen, but this is the biggest piece of crap I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: Wonderfully made
Reviews.Content: Well it was a gift for a friend and she is absolutely loving it. I will definitely be buying again.

Reviews.Title: Just OK Camera
Reviews.Author: Jan Cole
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras for work.  They make ok pictures but nothing really great.  My iphone makes way better pictures.  Would recommend it for a first camera for a pre-teen maybe.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Sandy Barnett
Reviews.Content: we were needing a new camera and this one was the perfect choice. the size, ease of use and accessories are just what we were looking for. thank you for offering such an excellent product!!!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: marknett
Reviews.Content: Really liking the camera so far ..  But buy a card for it if you want to use it. on the high pic setting which is the default setting, I accidently took one picture and the capacity was full. After adding the 4g card , I lowered the pixels down to 3 megapixles and took 98 pictures during the holidays and still had room.  the lens zoom is internal , the lens does not move forward . It a good camera for the price.  Kinda small for my big hands , but I got used to it

Reviews.Title: got it for a party
Reviews.Author: Kiki
Reviews.Content: Bought this specifically to use at a bday party in a nite club. Even in the dark it worked great! Plus its light  weight & small enuff to tuck in a prty sized handbag :-) You def have to buy  an sd card for use from the start. But i'd learned that from another reviewer.

Reviews.Title: Red Cam
Reviews.Author: wolfmama
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. Small yet takes great pictures. A very good deal for the money. Arrived before tracking date.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck Herget
Reviews.Content: This company sure gets everything to you as they promise! I am very very happy with the camera! I find nothing wrong with it?? Totaly HAPPY!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera...for the price.
Reviews.Author: Holli
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, point and shoot camera. Would like it to take better inside pictures. Goes through batteries quickly... recommend rechargeable batteries for extended use!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Keyanna Scott
Reviews.Content: It takes my daytime pictures perfectly, but even with the flash it is best to only take nightime or inside pictures if you have some background lighting available.

Reviews.Title: I like it !
Reviews.Author: Patricia Restrepo
Reviews.Content: I was replacing a camera stolen from me in December a Kodak 143, with a slightly larger screen.  It wasa little out of my "affordbility range" when I ordered it, but its a good substitute, and overall I'm very satisfied.The photos I have downloaded to my computer are just as sharp and clear.  I like it!

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare camera
Reviews.Author: al watts
Reviews.Content: No support from Kodak web site, camera never work correctly.I contract Kodak company, the camera is longer is produce.

Reviews.Title: teacher
Reviews.Author: teacher
Reviews.Content: beautiful. AA battery drains too soon after just three photos but will carry extra ones in My camera pouch in my purse. may not figured it out good yet why batteries are doing this but I dont think so. Camera is lightweight. small. ease for in purse. my extra camera when what that heart stopping picture phone may not get!

Reviews.Title: Grainy pictures and bad USB cable
Reviews.Author: Karen Maloney
Reviews.Content: You cannot zoom in with this camera or the picture gets very grainy. Now, 2 months later the USB cable won't work on it and it is past the one month I would have been able to return it. I liked the Koday EasyShare C190 and I regret that I bought this one.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Neal Damiano "urbanjournalist@aol.com"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for travel to use with my ipad 2. I also  bought the camera adaptor sd card slot for the ipad so I can easily put my pics onto it. I can't say enough good things about this camera for what I paid. It was $49.99 out the door it takes a crisp clean picture at 12mp and the zoom is clean at near focus. Very easy to operate. I use it all the time functions very well.

Reviews.Title: Works Great.
Reviews.Author: Rlayne
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase by all means and the price was just right ,I am taking pictures again and again the quality is excellent also the camera is a great help in that it automatically focuses on the face of the people or the objects, it also make the normal item look even better than it looks with the normal eyes.Operation very simple so that it make you feel not to put it down,to me this was a BEST buy.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: MBrooks
Reviews.Content: The camera is fine BUT IT DID NOT come with a storage memory card (MB card?) so I had to buy one at WalMart before I could give the camera as a gift.  Without the memory card, it was incomplete and I was disappointed that this wasn't made clear when I ordered.

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: aaron buffington
Reviews.Content: My wife recieved this camera for christmas ! she took pic's of the deer in the neighbor's field today!  Great pic and Kodak quality

Reviews.Title: Perfectly named
Reviews.Author: Blue Boat
Reviews.Content: Got this for my nine-year old daughter, who loves to make movies with her friends...and then wants to share them.  The Easyshare is foolproof (the fool being me, not my daughter, since I've used it too), takes high-quality pictures and best of all, and this was a big reason why I got it, uses batteries so the where-the-heck-is-the-charger issues that plagues most of our arsenal of cameras is irrelevant.  Would recommend this to anyone, for high quality photos, sturdy build and great value.

Reviews.Title: kodak c1505
Reviews.Author: shy girl
Reviews.Content: i think the camera is simple and just ok for the right price..i like the color since its so cute,but im wondering if I take a shot or picture it click two times or made a sound twice..I dont know if theres something wrong with it or its really like this.But for overall I think theres no problem..

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Great quality of pictures. i love that it is mac compatable. Look at the other reviews and get the extra memory card.

Reviews.Title: My New Easy Share
Reviews.Author: Barbara Boulanger
Reviews.Content: It was somewhat smaller than I had hoped, but,  it will work just fine.  I am anxious to put it to good use.I think I will be very pleased with it.  Barb

Reviews.Title: figured out why the camera is so inexpensive...
Reviews.Author: Davette Norman "D. Myndi"
Reviews.Content: share drivers no longer available & have to remove memory card & use a reader to extract photos. "share" button doesn't work

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshre
Reviews.Author: Caroline Connor
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I am sorry they are not making this model anymore.  Best camera I ever had.  Super easy to use and download into my computer.  I carry one in my purse  as much as I can.  You never know when you will see something special.

Reviews.Title: Not what it's cracked up to be
Reviews.Author: Michael P
Reviews.Content: Lousy camera. Difficult to use. Not good for close-ups which is what I wanted it for. Difficult to extract pictures from it also. Only holds two pictures in internal memory.

Reviews.Title: Love my Easy Share Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Jobe
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera! It's so easy to use, not heavy to carry and takes good pictures too.I had one just like and dropped it and broke it, so was very happy to find this one to purchase as areplacement. I received this order promptly and it was packaged really well. This is an A+ company.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Don H.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 86 year old friend along with a selphy printer.  She is tickled pink!  Easy for her to use straight out of the box

Reviews.Title: No memory stick
Reviews.Author: Shari Dunn
Reviews.Content: The ad for this camera said it came with a 16 gig memory stick, how ever we did not recieve one. Is it too late to ask for it?

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: nan
Reviews.Content: I like this camera it was a little smaller then I thought it would be. But it takes good pictures for the price I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Katie Epp
Reviews.Content: Gift for our 7 year old son.  He loves it!  This was the best gift of the season for him.

Reviews.Title: Not a great camera
Reviews.Author: L. Britt
Reviews.Content: I have only Kodak cameras, and I wanted an inexpensive version to use at work. The pictures aren't very clear, and though it takes regular AA batteries, it sucks them dry in no time. I get better pictures using the camera in my phone. Sorry Kodak. I love you guys, but this little guy is a fail.

Reviews.Title: trash it!!
Reviews.Author: Luis F. Pabon "red Warthog"
Reviews.Content: This was the worst camera I've ever bought.the zooming is very poor, It's also  made out of cheap plastic materials.I ended up throwing it in the trash.

Reviews.Title: Merp
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for and I knew it going in.  Not a great buy but would make someone a good first camera

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice
Reviews.Author: Linda M Burns
Reviews.Content: This camera was perfect for my granddaughter.  She loved it.  She is 7 years old - with 2 older brothers she always wants to be just like them or better - she seems to do just that.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera with no frills.
Reviews.Author: Judy Cummings
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera for quick pictures.  Easy to use.  Too bad Kodak is out of the camera business cause no software.  I already have the software from my main camera and was able to load it on one computer not the others so have to use it without software.

Reviews.Title: Didn't even work: horrible customer service from Kodak
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Price
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter's birthday. When I received it it wouldn't even turn in so I went out and bought special rechargeable batteries. That didn't work so I called Kodak's customer service hoping they could help me because now it's was the day before my daughter's birthday. They wouldn't even talk to me about the problem unless I agreed to the $15 an hour fee. I told them that the camera didn't even work. They said I could email them for free and they could try to trouble shot it.  I asked them how emailing was going to fix something that didn't even work in the first place. They suggested that I contact Amazon that their customer service could help me.  I will never purchase another Kodak camera again

Reviews.Title: My mom is happy
Reviews.Author: Della
Reviews.Content: She wanted a camera that would allow her to upload pictures to Facebook. I bought it for her as a surprise for Christmas and she was indeed surprise. It was a very good purchase. The camera is easy to use and to understand for uploading.

Reviews.Title: GReat Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Beverly Griffin
Reviews.Content: I really like this easy to use and upload pictures.  Great size to fit in my glove box or purse. It is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Hard on batteries
Reviews.Author: rosebud.972
Reviews.Content: camera is great but it is hard on batteries, I always have to have extra batteries after a few pictures it flashes low battery

Reviews.Title: User-friendly camera
Reviews.Author: VFS
Reviews.Content: We purchased this particular camera as the price was excellent and my husband and I are not great with technical items! We wanted a camera that was easy to operate but would still capture decent images of our vacations, and so far this has worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Yikes!
Reviews.Author: Christine L. Geving "Christine Geving"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely can't figure out how to make this camera speak  in English, no less take a picture. Any suggestions?  Help!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: B. Brown "bdb"
Reviews.Content: love Kodak camera - willing to purchase more for other members of my family.  others will love this alsothank you

Reviews.Title: Camera memory card
Reviews.Author: stephen r dickson
Reviews.Content: Be sure the card you buy is a SDHC card !!!!!!!!!!!! If not it will NOT work !!!!!!!!!!! camera not bad for the money. Easy to use. Good features . The easy share will Not run on Windows 8

Reviews.Title: Great 1st Camera!
Reviews.Author: Nikoli Volkoff "Gottoast"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my neice to have as her first camera on her 6th birthday, very easy to use and she loves it! Also got the HDE Camera Case for Kodak EasyShare Models & SanDisk 8GB SD High Capacity Card (SDSDB-008G-B35) to go with it, great inexpensive combination that'll provide lots of enjoyment!

Reviews.Title: BUY A BETTER MEMORY CARD WITH IT
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom and it serves its purpose- a crappy digital camera for someone who isn't very good with technology.She loves it, but the pictures aren't the best and it takes (and eats up) batteries.If you do get this camera, make sure you buy a good memory card with it! I think the one it comes with can hold about 10 pictures.... Don't really get the point other than trying to be cheap I guess.

Reviews.Title: Horrible pictures, no autofocus, no lens cover
Reviews.Author: K. Brakenhoff
Reviews.Content: Pictures were blurry due to inability to focus.  Holding the shutter partially does not result in an autofocus, but takes a picture instead that you will end up deleting.  DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use with fantastic results
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: After getting this camera, I'm may look into more kodak items. After installing the New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, this camera has work wonders. It has everything a photographer could want and it is easy to use. What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: don't really like it...
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: Had to buy a memory card in order to save any pictures, batteries are sucked dry to quickly, just not worth fifty-eight dollars. There are better cameras for slightly more money and I should have considered them more closely, just didn't have the extra twenty at the time. Penny wise, pound foolish..oh well chalk up another "comes home with rocks" experience for me. Duh!

Reviews.Title: good for the deal.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Hale
Reviews.Content: This was a great starter camera for my sister.  It's easy to use and does the job for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: GVC
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple Kodak Easyshare cameras at work.  They were great.  When it came time get my wife a new camera, I thought of the Kodak for it's ease of use and easy downloading using the Kodak Easyshare software.  I noted during purchase that Kodak was not going to support the camera anymore.  I assumed that meant they wouldn't be updating the software.  So I happily bought the camera.  I have since found out that not only is Kodak not going to upgrade the software, they have completely pulled the software off the web.  They do apologize for any inconvenience.  There are a few sites that say they have the software, I tried 3 of them, the software doesn't work, and others want to sell you somthing else at a price.  Ergo, what would have been a great little camera for my wife is almost useless. Extricating pictures from the camera is a pain, and not somthing my wife will ever want to learn to do. As well since buying it 3 weeks ago the price has dropped almost in half.  Should tell you somthing.  Don't buy a Kodak camera, unless you already have the software.Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom - BlackKodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom - Silver

Reviews.Title: Small, compact and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Bought for grandson. He loved it! Small, compact and easy to use. Affordable price and nice color made it a very attractive gift.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: denise
Reviews.Content: The plus for this product, it is easy to use.  My mother was in need of a new camera.  She has diabetes, which complicates vision and touch.  This Camera was perfect for that.  She has found it easy to hold, the button were perfect size and simple. Yet, this camera offered a variety of settings and optional cropping and editing.  However, some of the pictures seem to be blurry at times. It is a good pixel for close pictures, however, not distant or sporting events.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare
Reviews.Author: Creola Brossman
Reviews.Content: i like it very much,it is light weight and very simple to use.it was great value for the money it cost

Reviews.Title: setup is a bear, but a good camera otherwise!
Reviews.Author: Brenna Lyons "Men are animals, and women woul...
Reviews.Content: The first time set-up with the computer is a bear. I had to restart it twice, because it kept getting stuck. Once I got past that (not too bad...maybe 30 minutes), it was easy sailing.The pictures are crisp and clear, and I haven't run out of batteries yet, despite using the camera for both stills and video five times. Of course, I purchased commercial batteries, so maybe that makes the difference. I am carrying spares with me, so when they do run out, I'll be ready.My only real complaint so far is that there's no lens cover that closes when you turn off the camera. That's always been standard on digital cameras I've owned. I'll have to invest in a soft cover for the camera to keep the lens from being scratched in the bag.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for kids
Reviews.Author: usuallyhappy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my five year old.  He has outgrown the kids camera and actually takes good pictures.  I needed something inexpensive but better quality.  This camera is easy to use with a big display screen.  The quality of picture is fine for our use.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: C. Brauer
Reviews.Content: This camera is acceptable quality. It's easy to use, takes OK pictures and was affordable. If you're looking for a budget camera that you can live with this might be it.

Reviews.Title: Just o.k. camera for the money
Reviews.Author: audrey
Reviews.Content: This is not a great camera as the battery door is very hard to open and close, but it does the job and is very affordable.

Reviews.Title: amazin
Reviews.Author: jennifer maldonado vzla
Reviews.Content: beautifull colorit work so wellim happyi will get more soon to share with familygood camera for the price

Reviews.Title: Camera for Trip
Reviews.Author: Joan L. Harp
Reviews.Content: I am looking forward to using this camera on our cruise to Alaska this summer.  Seems very easy to use for this amateur.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pics!  Don't waste your time and money.
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I was looking for a small digital to fit in my pocket when traveling to some difficult locations.  Also, I needed one that used AA batteries.  This seemed perfect.  When I got it, I decided to try it out around town before taking it on a trip to Haiti.  It was AWFUL!  I have only a single photo from my nephew's First Communion that is not blurry.  Unless people are standing still, the pics are blurry.  I returned it yesterday (after less than a week) and am going back to my 5 year old Canon...which takes much better pics.  I'm bummed, but thankful for Amazon's easy return policy.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: ve340335 Victor Hernandez
Reviews.Content: It should bring a rechargable battery, not a 2A regular one, but i think it would be usefully, it's nice

Reviews.Title: Not the best focus
Reviews.Author: kellif
Reviews.Content: When I try to push down the shutter button half way to focus, the picture is taken before focusing.  Most of the time not a problem, but no fancy shots.

Reviews.Title: nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dawn skinner
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. Used it at my son;s prom and the picture quality was good. I really like the red color.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I purchased this camera
Reviews.Author: Anna M Oslica
Reviews.Content: This camera takes really good pictures.  It's very easy to pack and carry.  The batteries last a long time. The flash feature only helps in close situations. The easy share is extremely simple and fast. Overall, a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: Diane w
Reviews.Content: I would love this camera but it will not hold the charge cord in place and therefore I can not download the pictures or recharge the camera.I tried to return it but never got a email telling me how. I finally ran across the hows but now it is too late. It is not the cord it seems to be the slot in the camera that is loose. Otherwise I would love this camera. If possible I would trade it in for a another one just like it. I don't often sign in to my kindle account that is why I didn't find the return policy.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures for the money
Reviews.Author: L. Mawdsley
Reviews.Content: Pretty good little camera for the money.  Durable and quality is as expected. Loved the red color. Only returned because daughter wanted hot pink. Perfect camera for a kid age 5-10.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: VoodooDali "RPG fanatic"
Reviews.Content: I needed a little camera to deal with some simple photo projects.  This one was the right price.It takes good pictures.  I take a lot of them in the shade without a flash and they turn out fine.  The only thing I have a problem with is extreme closeups being blurry, but that might be due to my ignorance of cameras rather than the camera itself.Also - the "share app" is worth downloading from Kodak.  It is used to import your photos from the camera to the computer and also to share on Facebook if you want.  I find it works better than the native Windows importer.

Reviews.Title: VERY small
Reviews.Author: Colleen Gyori
Reviews.Content: I should have researched this item better. It is disappointing in that it does not have re-chargeable batteries and it is VERY small.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for my 10 year old granddaughter
Reviews.Author: donna45
Reviews.Content: She has been taking pictures since she was 3 years old and has an excellent eye for photography. She had an old Vivitar that still worked, but it didn't download onto the computer. She loves saving them to the computer, the focus is excellent and it has enough zoom for her.

Reviews.Title: doesnt work!
Reviews.Author: Paramedicated
Reviews.Content: My daughter was let down with her gift - didnt work more than an hour before totally not responding :(

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Hippiewannabe
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mom for Christmas and so far it has worked good! She loves the camera and is happy with the quality of the pictures! It is a little on the small side and for her it's hard to read the writing on it for the buttons. Once she had used it for awhile she got used to the buttons and hasn't had any problems with it. Definetly a good camera for the price!!

Reviews.Title: easy share
Reviews.Author: vickie
Reviews.Content: I like the camera it takes well enough pictures, I guess I would have liked to have more zoom power but it's still a good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Confaulk
Reviews.Content: It takes beautiful pictures...very easy to use, and super light weight! I have used it several times thus far and have been very pleased with the photos.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Army Wife
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in February 2013, and it is really great! I needed something small and something that would do everything I needed! I have NO regrets or complaints.If you read the full details about the camera and the area which denotes what comes "in the box", so to speak, you will see that it does NOT come with a memory card.  It states that it comes with room for 1 picture or video.  You can buy a memory card (as I did) from Amazon.com as well, and it works perfectly.  I bought a 32MB SanDisk Memory card, and I have been enjoying this little camera every single day!I HIGHLY recommend this product....

Reviews.Title: kodak easyshare c1505 12 MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Frances Lawrence-Ulak
Reviews.Content: I love the camera it takes great pictures.What I thought was I could use it with my easyshare printer dock but I can't.Would recommed it for anyone very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Grandson loved it....
Reviews.Author: Ninny
Reviews.Content: Got it for our grandson for Christmas ... He's really Enjoyed it... He will use it in his school projects as well as for his

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: SlowRide
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 6 year old grand-daughter and she learned to use it with no trouble. It seems to work really well and she likes it. If she's happy, so am I.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share is so easy To use
Reviews.Author: Jeanine M Ondreka
Reviews.Content: I love how easy it is to use!!! The quality of the picture is really beautiful! I would tell people to buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: scotta
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this product. After two months, the camera just shut off. The camera stopped working for no fault of my own and I didnt appriciate it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great service!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth 98
Reviews.Content: Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x DigitalWe like how fast the camera works and how fast it was delivered.My grandaughter love's it!Thank you!Marianella

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kris Webber
Reviews.Content: It seems to be working great, small and light especially for people who don't want a bulky camera. My son loves it (was a christmas gift for him) Easy to share photo's too.  So far we all love it.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use.
Reviews.Author: john barthel
Reviews.Content: We stick this in the car for any scenery we spot.  Quality pix and easy to use.  The zoom is nice too

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Moe
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for the holiday. Wife was thrilled and the camera works like a charm. easy to use!picture come out very clear and colors are very rich!

Reviews.Title: EasyShare is Easy!
Reviews.Author: CactusPain
Reviews.Content: Needed this for someone as a gift. They needed it to be simple, easy to load batteries, and easy menu navigation. Worked great!!

Reviews.Title: Great photos but no sound on video
Reviews.Author: Sandy Prince
Reviews.Content: This camera takes really great pictures and does video as well.  However it is kind of odd that you can't hear the sound on your video until its loaded onto your computer.  Had we known that we would have picked a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, easy to use.  Price was good and the item shipped when promised.  Definitely worth the price for the camera

Reviews.Title: My shiny new red Camera
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: I had one almost like it a few years ago and liked it so much until when it broke, I had to have another one. This new one is a little bit more advanced but I will get used to it. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Very Prompt shipment and a GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Houle
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with oodles of great features.  I can't help but think that the others that reported bad pictures were doing something wrong!  The pictures are GREAT!True that you dont get an SD card....

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M Dunn
Reviews.Content: great camera for kids or someone with disabilitys easy camera to use, for adults also great for a gift for anyone

Reviews.Title: It is a good camera.
Reviews.Author: Robert Santiago
Reviews.Content: The camera is good for the price that I paid for it. Would I recommend it for that price? Yes, I would.

Reviews.Title: kodak easyshare
Reviews.Author: ralph davis
Reviews.Content: very easy to use you can put it in your pocket, backpack or tackle box to take with you on trips.

Reviews.Title: SUCH AN GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: GODCHILD
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA THE PICTURES ARE SO SO CLEAR YOU WILL HAVE FUN ALSO VIDEOS ARE CLEAR AS WELL AND IT TAKES GOOD INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PICTURES I GOT BLESS FOR AND REALLY NICE PRICE.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: Stormynite
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera's quality for the price that I paid, it is worth it. The thing I am disapointed about is Kodak Easyshare on the ad say's you can share to Facebook and Youtube, which they no longer share with those two websites.(there were some other websites they don't share with also.) The other thing I would have perferred, is that the lens had a way of being covered. It is always exposed. But it does take nice pics, it works fine. Also, recieved it at my home very promtly. As far as the sharing issue, The camera did come with a USB cord so, you are able to upload your pics to your comp, for further uploading. :)

Reviews.Title: Not the best...
Reviews.Author: dEadDollY "dD"
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera for beginners.  The face recognition slows things down a bit and it's not a camera that you can take one picture quickly after another.  The social page share feature is cool, but that's easy to do with other cameras as well.  For an extra camera - this fits the bill, but if you want to take pics faster - go with Canon or Nokia.

Reviews.Title: Good secondary digital camera
Reviews.Author: Kellie Dunlap
Reviews.Content: We have 3 digital cameras in our household and this one is excellent for the price. No, it's not the best digital camera, but nobody should expect to get the best digital camera and pay only $58 for it. It's great for what it does.

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Varden
Reviews.Content: Camera works great, It was bought as a present for our daughter and she loves it, seems like she is constantly taking pictures, we are very happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Made a big Mistake
Reviews.Author: F. W. Stanton
Reviews.Content: I received this camera today 6/18/12, set it up with the batteries it came with. 1st, even at the lowest MP which  I be leave was 3.2 mp I could only take 6 pictures on internal memory, 2nd if you zoom in at all even at 12MP the picture is grainy, last but not least the batteries died after 10 flash pictures. I returned for refund

Reviews.Title: camera so cute
Reviews.Author: Curtin
Reviews.Content: I have many cameras.  This one is so small that it fits in my pocket.I am happy with it. The only thing that I wish it would do is zooma bit closer.

Reviews.Title: Camera is ok but...
Reviews.Author: missy
Reviews.Content: You absolutely need a memory card for the camera if you plan on taking more than one (1) picture. They do not make this clear when you read over the description so you get to find that out when you receive it. And I wouldn't bother trying to contact Kodak, I wasted 3 hours of my day trying to do that. I think it should be made clear that you NEED the memory card.Other than that, the camera seems fine.

Reviews.Title: About the kodak carmera
Reviews.Author: Sandra McGrady "Sandra Mcgrady"
Reviews.Content: The represitive was very patient and this person lead me inright direction help me out with my issue when i called first timeI was very please

Reviews.Title: christmas present
Reviews.Author: Joan Cruice
Reviews.Content: I already have one and purchased it for my friend for a christmas present.I was impressed with the speed and care shown for getting it to me in time for Christmas Eve, considering I made a mistake and the system said it would take 7 days. You made sure I got both the camera and card in time for Santa to give it to my friend. Kukos!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price !
Reviews.Author: Bravo
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes great pictures. If a data card was included with it, that would put this product over the top.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchasse
Reviews.Author: olderdude
Reviews.Content: We have another Easyshare camera which influenced my purchase - I like the picture quality. Pleased with the purchase, and it's receipt.

Reviews.Title: It's okay.
Reviews.Author: Mizz75241
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on eBay Deals for $29. From a glance, it is a small cheap digital camera. I purchased it for my niece Christmas present (can never start shopping too early). I tested it out at the Zoo. It takes clear pictures, however, once you zoom videos and pictures become grainy. That is the only flaw I've seen. My niece is only 9, so this will do. Nothing fancy.

Reviews.Title: false advertising
Reviews.Author: Jake Nickens
Reviews.Content: This camera is advertised as an underwater/waterproof camera. It is supposed to be able to both film and and take pictures underwater and yet as soon as this camera touched water it immediately stopped working and will no longer turn on.

Reviews.Title: no.
Reviews.Author: GenesisPro
Reviews.Content: That is not "no." as in abbreviation for Number.  It is "no." as in "no (period) I should not have bought this".  This camera is absolutely the worst purchase I have ever made online.  My phone takes better shots and recordings than this thing.  Granted, I do have a Galaxy S.  But this is claimed to have 12 mega pixels, 5x zoom.  The image is grainy in any setting & at any distance.  I am actually being 2 stars too generous with the 1 star rating.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it.
Reviews.Author: Eileen Ferkler
Reviews.Content: So far I have not got very good pictures.  Fuzzy, dark and all together not good. Would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy share
Reviews.Author: Oregon
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it was well worth the money. The only thing I would change about it is that the battery could be rechargeable and it could have a better view when you zoom in.

Reviews.Title: Kodak is back
Reviews.Author: BlackBart
Reviews.Content: This little Easyshare camera was not only a great buy, but it is a gem of a little digital camera that offers a ton of features. And, as the name implies it is very easy to share the pictures and videos. Another top value and speedy order processed by Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: It is ok
Reviews.Author: candice
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Kodak easy Share C513 camera. I have to say I liked my old one a lot better. It will work for now one of my complaints about this camera is when you take video it is really dark you have to have a lot of light behind whatever you are recording and the pictures are not the greatest either. I will be buying a different camera for sure. Hope this review was helpful.

Reviews.Title: not a great camera
Reviews.Author: dadof5
Reviews.Content: I used this camera once and never could take a clear picture. It is not my camera, but you would be shocked at the picture's poorness.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever...
Reviews.Author: Raphael
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak C1505 on Amazon a couple of months ago. This is by far the WORST camera I have ever owned. The pictures are terrible, no matter which setting you're on. All the pictures are out of focus, over-exposed, and lack color. I gave it to a friend who is a professional photographer, and she said the same thing. What a complete waste of money. Now I know why Kodak got out of the digital camera business.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Albert Cheung
Reviews.Content: Has difficulty taking pictures in natural light.  Sunny day?  Well, it's a bad day for photos with this one.  My particular model became unusable with a faulty LCD after only four months of use, but you might have better luck.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Soda
Reviews.Content: I got this a present for my sister and shes a facebook freak. She said everything works great no troubles easy to use

Reviews.Title: dangerous software!
Reviews.Author: Echosyn
Reviews.Content: The camera is very good but the EasyShare software is domineering, uncooperative with Mac and the EasyShare wireless app sets itself in the user account to open in the background at login. I deleted it from login items several times but it sets itself again every time I login. Kodak has not respected their customers and should die.

Reviews.Title: Please Do Not Buy This Camera!
Reviews.Author: You Can Do Alot Better!
Reviews.Content: I wanted a new and inexpensive camera....and sadly picked out this one.  I saw the review ratings, good price, and carries what I thought a decent name: Kodak.  I've had great luck and quality pictures from other cheap cameras.  This one is absolutely horrible!Please.....DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!  I can't stress that enough!

Reviews.Title: no good product
Reviews.Author: Michael Della Rovere
Reviews.Content: KODAK USE TO BE PRODUCT EVERYONE WANTED TO OWN HOWEVER THIS PRODUCT LIKE ALL THERE OTHER PRODUCTS FAIL AFTER A SHORT AMOUNT OF TIME. AFTER BUYING THIS CAMERA AS A SMALL GIFT KODAK AND ME ARE DONE FOREVER...

Reviews.Title: No ability to manually focus.
Reviews.Author: Wyatt Dufrane
Reviews.Content: This is a toy.  No ability to control focus, which I consider to be a pretty basic feature as most cell phone cameras even have this.  Don't expect to take a photo of anything closer than a yard.  Camera on my iphone  blows this thing away!

ProductInfo.Features:
Kodak's Share Button tags to FACEBOOK and more3
Advanced video features
Multiple scene modes and color options
High ISO (1250)
Runs on AA batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom - Red
